roleset.name: assign a label or attribute; specify features or boundaries
roleset.note: DEFINE-V NOTES: Comparison with 'regard'. Member of VNcls characterize-29.2-1-1, reflexive_appearance-48.1.2. (from define.01-v)
DEFINITION-N NOTES: Corresponds with define.01. Framed by anwen april 2011 (from definition.01-n)

example.name: all args
example.text: Time Warner emphasized in a news release that it should be evaluated based on its cash flow, which-1 the company defined *trace*-1 as earnings before interest, taxes, depreciation and amortization.
example.arg: as earnings before interest, taxes, depreciation and amortization

example.name: All args
example.text: Jack's definition of rockabilly as a type of country music angered Gretchen.
example.arg: as a type of country music

example.name: medical uses; Arg2 as a 'defined by' phrase
example.text: The area around the needle localization was defined by a brown-tan area, 3.0 cm x 2.1 cm.
example.arg: The area around the needle localization
by a brownish-tan area, 3.0 cm x 2.1 cm.

roleset.name: highlighting, emphasizing
roleset.note: DEFINITION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on more-nouns. No VNcls. Comparison to verb-underline.01. (from definition.02-n)

example.text: Excessive definition of the cheekbones can produce an unnaturally wide facial appearance across the mid-face.

Eastman Kodak Co. , seeking to position itself in the potentially huge high - definition television market , unveiled a converter that can transform conventional motion - picture film into high - definition video .
